amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to submit a report on the air traffic control communications void over the Gulf of Mexico.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1382 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1382 proposed by Senator Byrd for Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S9872; text: CR S9872) To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to submit a report on the air traffic control communications void over the Gulf of Mexico.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1382 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1382 proposed by Senator Byrd for Senator Landrieu.
